entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brandon Airport 8:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of freezing drizzle. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of freezing drizzle or light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 14 January 2023
